title: 107_hr1625
content: Samuel Kelner Commission on Youth Authorization Act - Establishes the Samuel Kelner Commission on Youth to seek to reduce apathy among US youth regarding the Nation's system of government by discussing and making policy recommendations on issues affecting US youth, including issues in the subject areas of: (1) public education, (2) youth employment and wages, (3) higher education financing, and (4) youth drug abuse and violence.
